review: Dr. Lall is a wonderful Doctor....Did a very clean and excellent job on my teeth. There was hardly any pain.... **** *** **** ****** *** *** ****** **** **********. Thanks to Him...

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Teeth Reshaping,Painful Teething,
review:
Hi,

I was trying to connect with Dr. Adosh Lall for a long time, but being failed due to some technical reason. 

Luckily, I received a call like a gift from Dr. Adosh to visit @ Apollo on 01/28/2020. I was suffering from multiple issues with my teeth. 

Before sharing  the feedback, one word to say, what a TREMENDOUS PERSONALITY DR ADOSH.  I just forgot everything by hearing his voice and polite way of talking.

Next day when I visited the hospital, he welcome with a grand happiness and elaborated each issues bit by bit without any hurry leaving huge smile on my face.  I was feeling like cureness has already begun without starting the treatment.

I salute his utmost level of treatment......his commitment and assurance regarding the action plan, i.e completely awesome. 

I had connected with him around 40 minutes,  he was continuously trying to encouraging me and  building the trust. He was too friendly.
He is a great human being  gifted by smile and always sharing the same to all.

Treatment point of view, ** ** *** **** *** ************ Once meet him and bring your smile back....

Thank You
Nutan Jha

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dental Clinic  and Doctor way of treatinting is excellent in all respect. 100% Complete satisfaction.

tags: None
review: Excellent doctor. ..have been visiting him for past 10 ten years. ....had a tooth that had gone so bad...It would have required extraction. ..However doctor ..will see if can save the tooth. ..He spent over an hourly cleaning that tooth. ..finally. .since a lot of work done..He said will do temporary filling..and after a day or two will do a permanent filling....He showed me the condition of tooth...With help of mirror..After cleaning it was only about 50 percent remaining. .He built it up..The remaining tooth with filling...which lasts till now. ..10 years on...  also one of last visit for one of the upper tooth...which had deep cavitie...wnet to three dentists near my home all said root canal. ..as cavity very close to the nerve or root....went to doctor Lal. ..like before requested if the tooth can be saved and avoid root canal. ..Dr Lal said looks like root canal...However will try and save....finally dr Lal did a good job and save this upper tooth also..and nearly 6 months after this job of upper tooth...still good...and no pain. ..best of all he saved the tooth from root canal. ...avoid other doctors in my close to my house...and drive more than 1.5 hours from Gurgaon to see him in his clinic in ranibagh Pitampura. ...very honest ...genuine good doctor. ...explains all details to his patients.....glad to have met him....recommend he opens clinics in other areas.....

tags: None
review:
I  found  the  Clinic  in  very  good  shape  and  State  of  the  Art  Clinic. The Clinic  was  neat, clean  and  hygienic. The  Doctor  and  attendants  were  very  cordial  and  accommodative. The  Doctor  did  a  detailed  screening  of  the  overall  mouth  and  teethes  and  took  an  X-Ray  of  the  affected  area. After  a  detailed  review  and  analysis  of  the  X-Ray, he  give  me  a  detailed  description  about  the  problem, procedure  of  treatment  and  tips  for  better  upkeep  of  Teeth  and  Gums. 

It  was  really  a  pain  free, informative  and  Educative  session  with  Dr. Adosh  Lall  and  his  team. I  really  appreciate  his  knowledge, Experience  and  care  extended  towards  me  during  my  visit. Iam  really  looking  forward  to  meet  him  on  Friday  this  week  for  my  next  session  of  treatment. I  can  firmly  say  that  now  iam  not  scared  of  Dental  problems  till  I  have  Dr.  Adosh  Lall  as  my  Dentist  !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Thanks

Chetan  Sharma
Age - 41 Years
E: chetansharma@adigroup.co.in

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I had bleeding gums thus visited dr. Adosh lall on 24/10/2017. I am not satisfied with this treatment as I have also started feeling pain *** ******* ** ** ****** ***** *** ********* and the problem is still there. Moreover, this doctor does not give any prescription after the treatment. Quite shocking. Not recommended to visit.
reply_text:
Priyanka,

Whenever  a patient  goes through  scaling  and polishing  , transiently  sensitivity and feeling of weakness increases for a  while but subsides gradually  and eventually  dissapears over a period of time.

 These tartar  deposits over teeth  prevent sensitivity from hot and cold , but lead to gingivitis ( gum disease) so cleaning  must  not be avoided.  
As regards  prescription  I feel any Dr must NOT  prescribe  medication  if not needed or  and wait to prescribe   as generally majority patients do not need any medication  after a basic procedure  like scaling and polishing . 

Lastly  incase your symptoms  do not improve within   a short  while after treatment please feel free  to visit us to rectify  the problem  that have been not addressed.  We will look forward to treating you and correcting any omissions.  
Regards, 
Dr Adosh lall

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: As always dr.adosh is considerate and thorough professional whom you can completely trust for advice and treatment .He is very amiable and spends time with patient to explain all the things and help patient make correct decision.I  have been going to him for.last 15 years and would recommend him  to everyone .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr is very friendly n caring ....his hands are gentle while he treats ,makes u feel comfortable and in safe hands.
The best part is that he follows up to ask u how u are feeling the next day.
I have got implants n capping done from him too.
I visit him n only him from 20 miles
I would recommend this doctor to everyone....
Wish him the bedt.
God bless....

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Its been more than 20 years that i am visiting to Dr Adhosh lall as i always got my treatment in a streamlined satisfactory way without any hastle. His way of explanation and practical thought process give comfort to his patients who doesn‚Äôt get any second thoughts pf not having a treatment. His work is impeccable and highly recommendable.

Thank you Dr Adhosh Lall to help people smile again. üòÅ
